attributes.additional_details:
The price of Oil and gas supply now means we are ransomed to the Oil and Gas producing nations.
The economic and financial maladies affecting us at the moment will not be cured whilst we pay these  highly inflated charges for imported energy,
 As our salvation seems to reside in our requirement to manufacture our way out of our current dire situation, it is essential to control our energy costs. Therefore we ( the government) must start immediately on constructing both wind power and nuclear power generating capacity to achieve a truly National independent energy/ectrical supply..
